title: Scientists Discover Ghostly 'Spookfish' That Prowls Pacific Ocean Floor
content: Scientists in New Zealand said Tuesday they have discovered a new species of "ghost shark", a type of fish that prowls the Pacific Ocean floor hunting prey more than a mile down.
summary: Scientists in New Zealand said Tuesday they have discovered a new species of "ghost shark", a type of fish that prowls the Pacific Ocean floor hunting prey more than a mile down.

title: Coldplay's Chris Martin In Disguise, Performs New Song At Vegas Bar
content: Coldplay frontman Chris Martin surprised fans at Dino's Lounge in Las Vegas on Saturday when he performed the band's new song, All My Love dressed in a ginger wig and oversized glasses.
summary: Coldplay frontman Chris Martin surprised fans at Dino's Lounge in Las Vegas on Saturday when he performed the band's new song, All My Love dressed in a ginger wig and oversized glasses.

title: Boeing Offers 30% Pay Hike Directly To Striking Workers, Angers Unions
content: Boeing Co offered a 30% pay bump directly to striking workers, angering union leaders, as the embattled planemaker tries to overcome a debilitating strike that has shut down plants across the Pacific Northwest.
summary: Boeing Co offered a 30% pay bump directly to striking workers, angering union leaders, as the embattled planemaker tries to overcome a debilitating strike that has shut down plants across the Pacific Northwest.

title: How Iran Immigrant Maky Zanganeh Is Now A Self-Made Billionaire In US
content: Maky Zanganeh became a billionaire after shares of Summit Therapeutics, where she serves as co-CEO, soared following positive trial data for its promising cancer drug.
summary: Maky Zanganeh became a billionaire after shares of Summit Therapeutics, where she serves as co-CEO, soared following positive trial data for its promising cancer drug.

title: 1982 to 2024: A 42-Year History Of Bloodshed Between Israel, Hezbollah
content: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 492 people in Lebanon, including 35 children on Monday. This marked the deadliest day of violence since the October 7 attack by Hamas on Israel.
summary: Israeli airstrikes killed at least 492 people in Lebanon, including 35 children on Monday. This marked the deadliest day of violence since the October 7 attack by Hamas on Israel.

title: Drunk Woman Handcuffed On Brazil Flight After Falsely Claiming Plane On Fire
content: A passenger, on board a Brazilian flight, had to be handcuffed and strapped to her seat after she repeatedly screamed that the aircraft was on fire.
summary: A passenger, on board a Brazilian flight, had to be handcuffed and strapped to her seat after she repeatedly screamed that the aircraft was on fire.

title: Venezuelan Gang Uses New York Migrant Crisis To Make Criminal Gains: Report
content: The Venezuelan criminal organization, Tren de Aragua, known for its involvement in sex trafficking, drug dealing, and human smuggling, has infiltrated New York City amidst a surge in migrants.
summary: The Venezuelan criminal organization, Tren de Aragua, known for its involvement in sex trafficking, drug dealing, and human smuggling, has infiltrated New York City amidst a surge in migrants.

title: G7 Nations Warn Against Middle East Escalation, Urge Immediate Truce
content: G7 nations warned on Monday that "no country stands to gain from a further escalation in the Middle East," as world leaders gathered in New York for the annual UN General Assembly.
summary: G7 nations warned on Monday that "no country stands to gain from a further escalation in the Middle East," as world leaders gathered in New York for the annual UN General Assembly.

title: "Grateful" For PM Modi's Support For Ukraine's Territorial Integrity: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky lauded Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday for his "clear support" of Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky lauded Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday for his "clear support" of Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity.

title: Social Media Using Your Data For AI? Here's How To Opt Out
content: While some platforms offer users the choice to opt out of data sharing for AI training, it's important to note that publicly posted content can still be accessed by third parties.
summary: While some platforms offer users the choice to opt out of data sharing for AI training, it's important to note that publicly posted content can still be accessed by third parties.

title: IMF To Work With Sri Lanka's New President On $3 Billion Loan
content: The International Monetary Fund said it's looking forward to working with Sri Lanka's newly elected leftist president, including on the latest review of the country's $3 billion bailout package.
summary: The International Monetary Fund said it's looking forward to working with Sri Lanka's newly elected leftist president, including on the latest review of the country's $3 billion bailout package.

title: Telegram Founder Pavel Durov Announces New Crackdown On Illegal Content
content: Telegram founder and chief executive Pavel Durov said Monday that the messaging platform had removed more "problematic content", weeks after his arrest in France on charges of failing to act against criminals using the app.
summary: Telegram founder and chief executive Pavel Durov said Monday that the messaging platform had removed more "problematic content", weeks after his arrest in France on charges of failing to act against criminals using the app.

title: Taliban Restrictions On Women Jeopardise Afghanistan's Fight Against Polio
content: The Taliban's decision to halt door-to-door polio vaccinations in Afghanistan has jeopardized the nation's fight against the disease.
summary: The Taliban's decision to halt door-to-door polio vaccinations in Afghanistan has jeopardized the nation's fight against the disease.

title: 'Doomsday Glacier' Is Heading For Collapse Sooner Than Expected
content: The scientists predict that Thwaites Glacier and the Antarctic Ice Sheet could collapse within the next 200 years.
summary: The scientists predict that Thwaites Glacier and the Antarctic Ice Sheet could collapse within the next 200 years.

title: Witness In France Mass Rape Trial Breaks Down, Says "I Lived A Lie"
content: A former partner of a co-defendant in a mass rape trial that has sparked horror and protests in France broke down in tears on Monday, telling the court she had "lived a lie" and might herself have been sexually assaulted.
summary: A former partner of a co-defendant in a mass rape trial that has sparked horror and protests in France broke down in tears on Monday, telling the court she had "lived a lie" and might herself have been sexually assaulted.

title: After Deadly Strikes, Netanyahu's Message For Lebanese People: 10 Points
content: Hours after Israeli strikes killed nearly 500 people in Lebanon, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu reached out to the Lebanese people and asked them not to become "human shields" for the Hezbollah.
summary: Hours after Israeli strikes killed nearly 500 people in Lebanon, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu reached out to the Lebanese people and asked them not to become "human shields" for the Hezbollah.

title: Meta's AI Chatbot To Speak In Voices Of Judi Dench, John Cena, Among Others
content: Facebook owner Meta Platforms is planning to announce this week that it has secured deals with actors including Judi Dench, Kristen Bell and John Cena to give voice to its Meta AI chatbot
summary: Facebook owner Meta Platforms is planning to announce this week that it has secured deals with actors including Judi Dench, Kristen Bell and John Cena to give voice to its Meta AI chatbot

title: Bangladesh Army Chief Vows Support For Interim Government 'Come What May'
content: Bangladesh's army chief vowed to back the country's interim government "come what may" to help it complete key reforms after the ouster of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina so that elections could be held within the next 18 months.
summary: Bangladesh's army chief vowed to back the country's interim government "come what may" to help it complete key reforms after the ouster of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina so that elections could be held within the next 18 months.

title: PM Modi Departs For India Wrapping Three-Day "Successful" US Visit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday left for home after wrapping up his "successful and substantial" three-day visit to the US.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday left for home after wrapping up his "successful and substantial" three-day visit to the US.

title: Mysterious 18th Century Necklace With 500 Diamonds Set For Auction
content: A mysterious 18th century necklace made from around 500 diamonds, some of which are believed to have been taken from a piece that contributed to Marie Antoinette's demise, will go on sale in November, Sotheby's said on Monday.
summary: A mysterious 18th century necklace made from around 500 diamonds, some of which are believed to have been taken from a piece that contributed to Marie Antoinette's demise, will go on sale in November, Sotheby's said on Monday.
